content: But just trying to understand one incentives you all are deploying to get sales, protect the backlog, and I'm hoping you all might be able to help quantify that impact your third or maybe even fourth quarter gross margin because I know you all occasionally will have some regional shifts and everything in there. But what, given the shifts you've seen, what is a -- what do you think is a reasonable pace to be able to target looking out the next couple of quarters as you balance kind of what you're willing to do on incentives versus how you're managing starts and things like and community openings, things like that.
